properties.name: Corner of Salida del Sol and Via Carisma
properties.description: Posted by Stacylouise 234 Salida del Sol, Santa Barbara, CA 93109On the Salida del Sol side of the corner, there are two apple trees planted between the sidewalk and the curb. On the Via Carisma side of the corner, there are two date palms planted between the sidewalk and the curb. The residence at this location has many fruit trees overhanging from their property (cherimoya, apple, banana, among others). However, it is not advisable to pick from these trees as the owner gets grouchy about it. Though, sometimes there is perfectly good fallen fruit. The trees I mentioned that are between the sidewalk and curb (apple and date palm) are perfectly fine to pick from.

properties.name: Jodi House
properties.description: Posted by Stacylouise 1235C Veronica Springs Road, Santa Barbara, CA 93105Back into this meandering cul de sac of local non-profits there is much public space that is unused. Adjacent to Jodi House/The Brain Injury Association of SB is an amazing persimmon tree. When it is yielding fruit, there is a complete over-abundance that goes under-used. As well, there are many orange trees around that are good for picking.

properties.name: Red Greape Vine on bike path
properties.description: Posted by Brysonric Fully grown red grape vine on bike path about 200 yards north of Hollister on the bike path. Seasonal fruit only, best in summer after late July. Growing on fence behind tennis courts opposite side of the creek on the bike path.
